title: EXPOSED: The QAnon Music Genre | 9/20/22
description:
A recent whistleblower has accused the FBI of breaking up January 6 investigations into multiple cases to exaggerate the number of domestic extremists in the country. The Left is losing its mind because of the stock music played at a recent Trump rally. Glenn and Stu review some other possible QAnon sound bites. Glenn takes calls from listeners to get their views of the current state of politics and answer their questions. Glenn explains the root cause of the ongoing fuel and energy crisis. The amount of aid America has sent Ukraine is staggering. Glenn and Stu discuss the absurdity of Democratic cities complaining about immigration. Glenn shares what’s helping him cope with the negative news of the day.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
